synopsis.text: World Purge, a mysterious malware, plunges the IS Academy into chaos as it hacks into the core systems, leaving Ichika Orimura's sister, Chifuyu, to rally his harem - Houki Shinonono, Cecilia Alcott, Huang Lingyin, Laura Bodewig, and Charlotte Dunois - to combat the virtual threat. As they delve into the digital realm, their deepest romantic desires involving Ichika are exploited, trapping them in a dreamlike state. Upon his return, Ichika must navigate these illusions and save the girls from their perfect yet perilous fantasies. Meanwhile, Tatenashi fends off a physical assault on the academy, escalating the stakes in this thrilling special episode. Will Ichika and his friends overcome these dual challenges and restore order to IS Academy?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
